alerts.message: CMC MODE OFF while an automated program is queued
RCS quad disabled while burn is armed
Low power margin while main buses remain untied
Cabin CO₂ rising with circulation fans offline
SPS banks not armed for scheduled burn
SPS main valves safe during burn countdown
S-band power off during scheduled DSN pass
SCS engine arm is SAFE while burn is armed
CMC breaker open while autopilot sequence pending
VHF breaker open during docking operations
LM descent engine safe during powered descent
EVA configured while suit flow not set to EVA
